channel.title: Engs on Hack MySQL
channel.description: Recent content in Engs on Hack MySQL

item.title: Level Up
item.description: ‘Level Up’ explains how software engineers can become the best in their field and produce more output than most.

item.title: Career Advice
item.description: ‘Career Advice’ lists advice to help ambitious software engineers become the best in their field.

item.title: How to Write Well
item.description: ‘How to Write Well’ is a short guide for software engineers on how to write well.

item.title: Database Operations Manual
item.description: ‘Database Operations Manual’ outlines requirements for operating a database server in production.

item.title: Percentiles
item.description: ‘Percentiles’ is a deep dive into how percentiles are calculated using nearest rank and linear interpolation.
